description: head and shoulders of a woman looking outward with a furrowed brow and slight frown on her face; hair is pulled back and falls to the shoulders; background and garment is in a faded red; hair is a cream color; and the face and neck are grayish with pink lips and eyes that are pink with blue irises
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil:  IV. Fassung E 91-K-2 Steine | LRC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1951
title: Woman's Head (Sonia Gramatté)
